api bohoma tharuna wayase kollo hatiyata eda aapu bhishanayata, ehema nathnam ee bhishane nisa samajayata wu waradda hodin dakka eeka anumatha nokala kandayamak widiyata apita danena wenasa athi karanna diwi nothaka kriya kala, eda api kala de prathipala ada mehema wela thiyanawa.
mema yojanawehi aththe nishchitha bhashawakata wada wiwrutha bhashawaki.

pradeshaye gowi pawul 5000 k pamana yapenne da me wi gowi thaneni.namuth me kundi wila aashi්rathawa siduwana yam, yam akatayuthukam nisa eyata balapam ellawana thaththwayak udgatha wi thibe.ala aashi්rathawa sidukara athi anawasara idikirima godakirim saha alehi jalaya basima palanaya karana pradhana doratu aasannaye bahula lesa jalaja palati bowima nisa ee thaththwaya uda wi atha.wasi kalayata ala margaya osse gala ena jalaya palanaya kirima sandaha yoda thibu adi hathare doratuwa iwathkara adi 12k usa jala doratuwak sawi kirimen wadi jalaya doratuwa udin nawatha ala margayata ekwimata kramayak nomathiwa awata pradeshawasin awurudu 34 k pamana wasi samaye di ganwathuren apamana pida windithi.me wil pahe jalaya basayama sandaha gampaha - ihalagama, bomaluwa pradeshaye idikara athi patu bokkuwa kramanukulawa pulul nokirima nisa jalaya harihati basa noyamen kumbauru akkara siya gananak waga nokara athhara dama thibe.ala margaya aarambhaye sita galaena jalakanda pahasuwen basayama sandaha gampaha dumriya sthanaya aasannaye parani wari thakshanaya anuwa idikara thibu jalaya basime wiwara thunen dekakma me wanawita anawasara idikirim sandaha godakara wasa dama thibe.

kese wethath mewan nomana hasirim sambandhayen sewillen sitina lesa upades dun niladhariya siya pahala mattame sewakaya aaraksha kirimata idiripath wuwahoth awul jalayak athiwiya haki yayi adala siddhiya sambandhayen dana sitina usas niladharihu eeye wana witath mahath se chanchala wi sitiyaha.

adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahathage mangapenwima matha kriyawata nanwena suraksha sisu rakshana wadasatahana magin shri lankawe pasal 11,242 k thula adhyapanaya labana pasal sisun laksha 45 kata aasanna pirisakata nomile saukhya rakshanawaranaya himiwe.
